history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: proj1_sig,ex_filterdiff_ext_loc. strivial use: FF, @filterdiff_ext, @filterdiff_continuous_aux unfold: ex_filterdiff, filterlim.

exceptions.tactic: apply ex_filterdiff_ext_loc with (f := f) (g := g) (l := proj1_sig Hdf).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f, g : U -> V Hfg : forall y : U, f y = g y Hdf : ex_filterdiff f F The term "Hdf" has type "ex_filterdiff f F" while it is expected to have type "{x : ?A | ?P x}".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: NormedModule K
U: NormedModule K
F: (U -> Prop) -> Prop
FF: Filter F
g: U -> V
f: U -> V

Goal:
(forall y : U, f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f F -> ex_filterdiff g F

Premises:
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
ex_filterdiff = fun (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => exists l : U -> V, filterdiff f F l : (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
ex_filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (H1 : ex_filterdiff f F) => match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g F l0) l (filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H H0 Hl) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g : U -> V, F (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) -> ex_filterdiff f F -> ex_filterdiff g F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _]
ex_filterdiff_ext_locally = fun (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (H : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H0 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g (locally x) l0) l (filterdiff_ext_locally f g x l H Hl) end : forall (f g : U -> V) (x : U), locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff g (locally x) Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope _ _ _]
filterdiff_ext = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g l : U -> V) (H : forall y : U, f y = g y) => filterdiff_ext_loc f g l (filter_imp (fun _ : U => True) (fun y : U => f y = g y) (fun (x : U) (_ : True) => H x) filter_true) (fun (x : U) (_ : is_filter_lim F x) => H x) : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g l : U -> V, (forall y : U, f y = g y) -> filterdiff f F l -> filterdiff g F l Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope _]
ball_norm_eq : forall x y : ?V, (forall eps : posreal, ball_norm x eps y) -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
filterlim_locally : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f0 ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f0 x))) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- UniformSpace] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- (?T -> Prop) ->...-> V |- Filter ?F]
ex_filterdiff_locally = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (f : U -> V) (x : U) (Fx : is_filter_lim F x) (H : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ l Df => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff f F l0) l (filterdiff_locally f x l Fx Df) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> forall (f : U -> V) (x : U), is_filter_lim F x -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff f F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _]
filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g l : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (__top_assumption_ : filterdiff f F l) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : is_linear l) (b : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))), (fun _ : is_linear l /\ (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))) => filterdiff g F l) (conj a b...
eq_close : forall x y : ?V, close x y -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
is_filter_lim_locally_unique : forall x y : ?V, is_filter_lim (locally x) y -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle_inv : forall x y : ?V, Rabs (norm x - norm y) <= norm (minus x y) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
opp_plus : forall x y : ?G, opp (plus x y) = plus (opp x) (opp y) where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbelianGroup]
plus_assoc : forall x y z : ?G, plus x (plus y z) = plus (plus x y) z where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbelianGroup]
continuous_scal : forall (k : ?U -> ?K) (f0 : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous k x -> continuous f0 x -> continuous (fun y : ?U => scal (k y) (f0 y)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
equiv_carac_1 : forall f0 g0 o : ?T -> ?V, (forall x : ?T, f0 x = plus (g0 x) (o x)) -> is_domin ?F g0 o -> is_equiv ?F f0 g0 where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Type] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U ->...-> V |- Filter ?F]
equiv_carac_0 : forall f0 g0 : ?T -> ?V, is_equiv ?F f0 g0 -> {o : ?T -> ?V | (forall x : ?T, f0 x = plus (g0 x) (o x)) /\ is_domin ?F g0 o} where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Type] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U ->...-> V |- Filter ?F]
ball_norm_sym : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball_norm x eps y -> ball_norm y eps x where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat2 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
Filter_prod : forall (F0 : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (?U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : ?T * ?U -> Prop) (Q : ?T -> Prop) (R : ?U -> Prop), F0 Q -> G R -> (forall (x : ?T) (y : ?U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F0 G P where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Type]
ball_norm_triangle : forall (x y z : ?V) (e1 e2 : R), ball_norm x e1 y -> ball_norm y e2 z -> ball_norm x (e1 + e2) z where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
plus_reg_r : forall r x y : ?G, plus x r = plus y r -> x = y where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbelianGroup]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- Filter ?F]
plus_comm : forall x y : ?G, plus x y = plus y x where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbelianGroup]
continuous_scal_r : forall (k : ?K) (f0 : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f0 x -> continuous (fun y : ?U => scal k (f0 y)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]

```coq
intros Hfg Hdf.
apply ex_filterdiff_ext_loc with (f := f) (g := g) (l := proj1_sig Hdf).
- intros y; apply Hfg.
- intros x Hxl; apply Hfg.
Qed.```
